Spiked Ball trap in Abyss


New animation Ball.CL2 is added to the MPQ (made by ArthurDent, based on unused 'Mindmace' CEL animation provided by Blizzard).


Spell effect 62h (missile):

Animation changed from 0E (doom) to 34 (now Ball, previous rglows1)

000A6E20 6200 0000 2313 4300 E860 4300 0100 0000 b...#.C..`C.....
000A6E30 0000 0E00 6800 0000 6400 0000           ....h...d...
changed into
000A6E20 6200 0000 2313 4300 E860 4300 0100 0000 b...#.C..`C.....
000A6E30 0000 3400 6800 0000 6400 0000           ..4.h...d...


Spell effect 12h (impact):

Animation changed from 0B (bone/doom9) to 12 (shatter)

000A6560 1200 0000 B62B 4300 1F84 4300 0100 0000 .....+C...C.....
000A6570 0200 0B00 7500 0000 FFFF FFFF           ....u.......
changed into
000A6560 1200 0000 B62B 4300 1F84 4300 0100 0000 .....+C...C.....
000A6570 0200 1200 7500 0000 FFFF FFFF           ....u.......


Image data 34 (pulsing activated rune) now used for Ball:

000AA6B8 7267 6C6F 7773 31                       rglows1
changed into
000AA6B8 6261 6C6C 0000 00                       ball...
